relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
There are security officers on site at all times.
The student center is always busy with people.
Construction is going on, there are just classes.
We have food trucks that offer meals of a wide variety...
This is a community college, there is no residency...

The classes allow for students to have discussions within the topic of conversation, that allow students to truly understand the content. The courses don't become too difficult, as long as people pay attention and become involved.
Apply early and become friendly with the faculty, especially the professors.

I rate southwest College a solid 7 out of 10, because the college tries. The college tries in the sense that, it may not be the most academic, or has the best student body, but it has resources. The resources to help students that want to succeed, and helps students get the credits they need to obtain an associates degree and transfer. I have seen that students have gone to schools such as UCLA and USC from this school, because the faculty truly dedicate themselves and knows there are individuals that can be steered into the right direction.
pageTitle: Los Angeles Southwest College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
